product_description: The Mystic bag from Clare Waight Keller takes inspiration from the mysterious aura surrounding recent haute couture looks.
product_details_and_care:
The Mystic bag from Clare Waight Keller takes inspiration from the mysterious aura surrounding recent haute couture looks. The angular design features a triangular flap detailed with a double-G magnetic closure and a suede interior with a contrasting leather zip pocket. Carry it by the top handle or attach the slender strap so you can sling this calfskin-leather beauty over your shoulder with ease.
Magnetic-snap flap closure
Top carry handle; removable, adjustable crossbody strap
Exterior slip pocket
Interior zip pocket
Suede lining
Leather
Made in Italy
Designer Handbags
Item #5852336
product_size_info:
10 ½"W x 8"H x 6"D. (Interior capacity: medium.)
6" strap drop; 16 ½" - 19" shoulder strap drop.
2.5 lb.
